actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 98-369.
Laid on Table in House by Unanimous Consent.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 2144) to amend Part C of title III of the Higher Education Act of 1965 to establish and endowment program for developing institutions, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 2144 (endowment grants for developing educational institutions).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 2144) to amend Part C of title III of the Higher Education Act of 1965 to establish and endowment program for developing institutions, and for other purposes.
